price: 40. Realmente, obtendrá una posición privilegiada cerca de Nos y un buen lugar de retorno (en el paraíso).
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
